metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the win-def:registry_test is properly supported.
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the win-def:registry_test.

notes.note: It is important to note that the values used in this test definition are specific to a particular machine, and may not necessarily apply to your system. As a result, in order to have the definition return a result of 'true', you must either change these values to the ones found on your particular system, or you must configure your system to use these values.
Information regarding the registry on your particular machine can be found by navigating to Start->Run... and by typing 'regedit'.

criterion.comment: Test if a registry_object with a hive is supported.
Test if a registry_object with a hive key is supported.
Test if a registry_object with a hive, key, and name is supported.
Test if a registry_object with a hive, key, and name pattern match is supported.
Test if a registry_object with a hive, key pattern match, and name pattern match is supported.
Test if a registry_object with a hive, key pattern match, and name is supported.
Test if a registry_object is supported with a empty string for a registry key name.
Test that the max_depth behavior is supported with a limited depth of recursion.
Test that the max_depth behavior is supported with a unlimited depth of recursion.
Test that the recurse_direction behavior is supported in the 'up' direction.

registry_test.comment: Test if a registry_object with a hive is supported.
Test if a registry_object with a hive key is supported.
Test if a registry_object with a hive, key, and name is supported.
Test if a registry_object with a hive, key, and name pattern match is supported.
Test if a registry_object with a hive, key pattern match, and name pattern match is supported.
Test if a registry_object with a hive, key pattern match, and name is supported.
Test if a registry_object is supported with a empty string for a registry key name.
Test that the max_depth behavior is supported with a limited depth of recursion.
Test that the max_depth behavior is supported with a unlimited depth of recursion.
Test that the recurse_direction behavior is supported in the 'up' direction.

registry_object.comment: Retrieve a registry_object with a hive equal to 'HEKY_LOCAL_MACHINE'.
Retrieve a registry_object with a hive equal to 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE' and key equal to 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion'.
Retrieve a registry_object with a hive equal to 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', key equal to 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion', and name equal to 'CurrentVersion'.
registry_object.name: CurrentVersion

registry_object.comment: Retrieve a registry_object with a hive equal to 'HEKY_LOCAL_MACHINE', key equal to 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion', and name matches a regular expression'.
registry_object.name: CurrentVersi.*

registry_object.comment: Retrieve a registry_object with a equal to 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', key pattern matches a regular expressoin, and name pattern matches a regular expression'.
registry_object.name: CurrentVersi.*

registry_object.comment: Retrieve a registry_object with a hive equal to 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', key pattern matches a regular expression, and name equals 'CurrentVersion'.
registry_object.name: CurrentVersion

registry_object.comment: Retrieve a registry_object with a hive equal to 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE' and key equal to 'SOFTWARE\classes\regedit\shell\open\command', and name equal to ''.
Retrieve a registry_object with a hive equal to 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', key equal to 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT', recursing down one level, and name equal to 'CurrentVersion'.
registry_object.name: CurrentVersion

registry_object.comment: Retrieve a registry_object with a hive equal to 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', key equal to 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft', recursing down infinitely, and name equal to 'CurrentVersion'.
registry_object.name: CurrentVersion

registry_object.comment: Retrieve a registry_object with a hive equal to 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', key equal to 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Winlogon', recursing up one level, and name equal to 'CurrentVersion'.
registry_object.name: CurrentVersion

registry_state.comment: This registry_state represents a registry_object with a hive equal to 'HEKY_LOCAL_MACHINE'.
This registry_state represents a registry_object with a hive equal to 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE' and key equal to 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion'.
This registry_state represents a registry_object with a hive equal to 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', key equal to 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion', and name equal to 'CurrentVersion'.
registry_state.name: CurrentVersion

registry_state.comment: This registry_state represents a registry_object with a hive equal to 'HEKY_LOCAL_MACHINE', key equal to 'SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion', and name pattern matches a regular expression.
registry_state.name: Current.*

registry_state.comment: This registry_state represents a registry_object with a equal to 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', key pattern matches a regular expression, and name pattern matches a regular expression.
registry_state.name: Current.*

registry_state.comment: This registry_state represents a registry_object with a hive equal to 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', key pattern matches a regular expression, and name equals 'CurrentVersion'.
registry_state.name: CurrentVersion

registry_state.comment: This registry_state represents a registry_object with a hive equal to 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE', key equal to 'SOFTWARE\classes\regedit\shell\open\command', and name equal to ''.
